DOC.brief_title: Brimonidine Purite 0.15 % Versus Dorzolamide 2 % Used Adjunctive Therapy Latanoprost
DOC.criteria: · Male female > 18 year age Diagnosis openangle glaucoma ocular hypertension IOP > 16 mm Hg eye latanoprost treat baseline evaluation Presently latanoprost monotherapy least 6 week Ability provide inform consent likely complete study visit · Known contraindication allergy brimonidine component Subjects must naive brimonidine 0.2 % brimonidine Purite 0.15 % dorzolamide 2 % Uncontrolled systemic disease Active ocular disease glaucoma ocular hypertension ( e.g . uveitis , ocular infection , severe dry eye ) . Patients chronic mild blepharitis , cataract , agerelated macular degeneration , background diabetic retinopathy may enrol discretion investigator . Required use ocular medication study medication study ( intermittent use artificial tear product allow ) . Corneal abnormality History intraocular surgery within last 3 month Female patient childbearing potential pregnant , lactate , plan pregnancy , use reliable form birth control Visual field loss , opinion investigator , functionally significant , evidence progressive visual field loss within last year .
